phrs.translation: 菊花茶；菊花晶（茶菊花萃取物制品）
n. 野菊花，野菊花粉末

sentences.sentence: The Double Ninth cake is also known as "chrysanthemum cake" or "flower cake".
sentences.translation: 重阳糕又名“菊糕”或“花糕”。

sentences.sentence: Drinking chrysanthemum is regarded as a way to prevent disasters and bad things.
sentences.translation: 喝菊花茶被认为是一种预防灾难和坏事的方法。

sentences.sentence: A series of smaller terraces lining the east and west of the square will be adorned with local flowers such as Chrysanthemum and pansy.
sentences.translation: 一连串较小的露台排列在广场东面和西面，它们将装饰上本地花卉，例如菊花和三色紫罗兰。
